thread.title_full: BlueSun Vacations reviewed by CIndy H. (Michigan)

author: CIndy H. (Michigan)
title: CIndy H. (Michigan)
text: I had been looking for quite some time for a destination for our 30th anniversary and it was so overwhelming going thru so many websites with so many different prices and so many good and bad reviews, I was so worried I would pick some place we didn't enjoy. I came across BlueSun Vacations one day and after reading all the great reviews I wanted to contact them and see if they could help me make a decision. I spoke with a very nice gentleman named Hew Moore who patiently listened as I explained everything I had researched and he knew exactly what I was looking for. He recommended Secrets Royal Beach Resort (Adults Only) in the Dominican Republic. He took care of booking flight, transfers, king room, along with a nice anniversary package upon arrival. It has taken a load off my shoulders to know it is all arranged and all we have to do now is pack. We aren't leaving until June so I cant give a review of how the trip went or how the resort was but I will stay positive that this will be a wonderful anniversary trip. Thanks Hew.
